definitions.definition: to wait or move in a secret way so that you cannot be seen, especially because you are about to attack someone or do something wrong:
examples: Someone was lurking in the shadows.

definitions.definition: (of an unpleasant feeling or quality) to exist although it is not always noticeable:
to spend time in a chat room or on a social media website and read what other people have posted (= written or added) without posting anything yourself
